name: 王明道
objective:
本課程旨在以專題設計方式，訓練學生確認並建立需求、發展設計選擇方案、製作設計的互動形式、設計評估的專業知能，並以設計專案方式演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組合作或獨自創作完成一媒體設計主題。上學期課程以題目釐定、資料蒐集、分析調查、設計定義、構想發展、程式設計、雛型製作等活動為教學內容；下學期則進行觀察測試、使用性評估、程式調校、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容，以培養學生具備互動設計專題製作之專業知能。
Through project design, the course prepares students to confirm the needs of design, develop alternatives of media design projects, create interactive modes, and evaluate design performance through independent study or cooperative learning. In the first semester, learning materials of the course include subject clarification, data collection, analysis and investigation, design definition, concept development, programming, and prototyping. In the second semester, learning materials of the course include observation and testing, usability evaluation, programming debug, report editing, exhibition and design report submission. Accordingly, students will be ready for professional competencies of interaction design projects.

name: 韓秉軒
objective:
本課程旨在以專題設計方式，訓練學生確認並建立需求、發展設計選擇方案、製作設計的互動形式、設計評估的專業知能，並以設計專案方式演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組合作或獨自創作完成一媒體設計主題。上學期課程以題目釐定、資料蒐集、分析調查、設計定義、構想發展、程式設計、雛型製作等活動為教學內容；下學期則進行觀察測試、使用性評估、程式調校、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容，並從策展、參展 (正式對外展出) 來學習面對不同族群與潛在顧客回饋，以培養學生具備互動設計專題製作之專業知能。
The course aims to train students in a project-based manner to identify and establish needs, develop design options, create interactive forms of design, and evaluate designs professionally. It involves practicing the entire design process through design projects, either in groups or individually, focused on a media design theme. The first semester covers topic clarification, data collection, analysis, design definition, concept development, programming, and prototype creation. The second semester involves observation testing, usability assessment, program adjustments, publication editing, exhibition arrangement, design report submission, and learning from curating and exhibiting (formally showcasing) to diverse audiences and potential customer feedback. This is to nurture students with professional expertise in interactive design project production.
